column2: You have the ability to work magic. Your magical nature disturbs normal people and animals.
You have the ability to work magic. Your magical nature does not disturb normal people and animals, your Gift is subtle and quiet.
You have the ability to work magic. Your magical nature severely disturbs normal people and animals.
You have been opened to Hermetic Magic. You know only the absolute mininum about the ten Hermetic Forms and as such may only cast the most trivial spells.

You have achieved beginner level comprehension of the Art of Animál, which deals with the bodies and minds of beasts of all manners, as well as all materials of animal origins. You may cast spells of Second Magnitude or lower.
You have achieved beginner level comprehension of the Art of Aquam, which deals with liquids of all kinds. You may cast spells of Second Magnitude or lower.
You have achieved beginner level comprehension of the Art of Auram, which deals with air, wind, vapours and all weather phenomena. You may cast spells of Second Magnitude or lower.
You have achieved beginner level comprehension of the Art of Corpus, which deals with the human body, its components, and humours. You may cast spells of Second Magnitude or lower.

You have achieved beginner level comprehension of the Art of Herbam, which deals with plants of all kinds, as well as all objects made from plants (e.g.: ivory and paper). You may cast spells of Second Magnitude or lower.
You have achieved beginner level comprehension of the Art of Ignem, which deals with fire, heat and cold, and light. You may cast spells of Second Magnitude or lower.
You have achieved beginner level comprehension of the Art of Imáginem, which deals with images, illusions, and perception of all senses. You may cast spells of Second Magnitude or lower.
You have achieved beginner level comprehension of the Art of Mentem, which deals with the human mind and its faculties. You may cast spells of Second Magnitude or lower.
You have achieved beginner level comprehension of the Art of Terram, which deals with earth, rocks, metals and all objects made of these materials. You may cast spells of Second Magnitude or lower.
You have achieved beginner level comprehension of the Art of Vim, which deals with magic and magical creatures of all kinds. You may cast spells of Second Magnitude or lower.
